entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries this afternoon. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 AM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:52 AM AST Monday 26 December 2022
